name: Dancing for a Cause
description: Released on April 29, 2021 on International Dance Day. 100% of the money generated by this sale will go to St. Basil School in Vallejo, CA. The money raised during the Dance-A-Thon will be used to upgrade classroom technology. I used rotoscoping, AI and hand painting to create this animation. You pick the music. Thank you BD robot for the inspiration.
